testcase.classname: Feature to test Contact page functionality
testcase.name: Check mandatory field errors are gone after entering values
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters Planit Demo website URL....................................passed Then user is redirected to Home Page........................................passed And user clicks on contact menu.............................................passed When user clicks on submit button...........................................passed Then mandatory field errors are shown on the page...........................passed And user populates correct data in all mandatory fields.....................passed Then all errors are gone....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Contact page functionality

testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters Planit Demo website URL....................................passed Then user is redirected to Home Page........................................passed And user clicks on contact menu.............................................passed When user populates correct data in all mandatory fields....................passed And user clicks on submit button............................................passed Then successful submission message is received..............................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Contact page functionality
testcase.name: Check Mandatory field errors
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters Planit Demo website URL....................................passed Then user is redirected to Home Page........................................passed And user clicks on contact menu.............................................passed When user enters incorrect data in all mandatory fields.....................passed Then mandatory field errors are shown on the page...........................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Contact page functionality
testcase.name: Check the added items in the cart from shop page
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open.......................................................passed When user enters Planit Demo website URL....................................passed Then user is redirected to Home Page........................................passed And user clicks on shop menu................................................passed When user adds Funny Cow item twice times...................................passed And user adds Fluffy Bunny item once........................................passed And user clicks the cart menu...............................................passed Then all the added items are displayed in the cart..........................passed
